BLASTRAGE gets struck by a shot as he takes a few steps from the 
impact. BLASTRAGE starts a fire in the base form his flame thrower. 
smoke rises and is barley visilble. CROW LORD turns around and starts 
to run the other way through the base away from the battle. but
before 
he leaves he fires a few shots at plintissa.
